content.question: Which of the following explains a reason scholars began to produce “radical reinterpretations” of Black history?

choices.label: To educate people on the common history that most African countries share
To challenge prevailing myths about the lack of contributions of Afro-descendants
To develop volumes of work on the enduring connections between Africa and Europe
To highlight early explorations of Africa by mainstream scholars

content.answer: To challenge prevailing myths about the lack of contributions of Afro-descendants

skill.text: 2.A: Identify and explain a source's claim(s), evidence, and reasoning.
